action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tower sage makes two Arcane Burst attacks and can use Starry Radiance if available.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) radiant damage.

action.name: Starry Radiance {@recharge 5}
entries: Dazzling light bursts from the tower sage's fingertips in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition blinded} condition until the end of the tower sage's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tower sage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
